name: Viral Life
description:
With all the social media around us we sometimes lose control of ourselves. We forget to do sports, to pay attention to our close ones or get out there and make new real friends. 

The main character in this game, Bob is addicted to getting attention in social media and he is constantly chasing the positive reactions of the community. Little does he know, these reactions are  devious and make him fatter and slower. How long will he be able to keep up with these transformations? It is up to you.

Controls:

Drag the mouse to increase Bob's velocity in a certain direction.

Avoid negative emojis, collect positive emojis.

Note: This game was developed in 3 hours for Trijam #62!

23 March Quick Fix #1: Moved the character to start the game from the center of the screen.

23 March Quick Fix #2: Uploaded HTML5 playable version. No changes were made to the game. The game was directly exported to run in the browser and the controls are not very reliable. For better experience, please consider downloading the game for your OS.
